intro.speaker: Merchant
intro.line: Blast... It seems all hope is lost. Still, hold fast. I'll treat your wounds...

intro.speaker: Merchant
intro.line: Nothing but death ahead, travelers. I'd turn back if I were you... Whatever your business here, it will have to wait.

intro.speaker: Merchant
intro.line: Bandits have blocked the road ahead. They're demanding a king's ransom in illicit tolls for all who wish to pass.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: They think to profiteer on refugees? Despicable.

intro.speaker: Merchant
intro.line: Our caravan's livelihood is at stake. We'll do no business in this country now...

intro.speaker: Frederick
intro.line: The flow of goods must be secured, milord, or the people are likely to starve.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Then we'll secure it. You and your caravan can wait here. We'll let you know when it's safe.

battle.speaker: Victor
battle.line: I daresay we've come across a village, Vincent.

battle.speaker: Vincent
battle.line: And what a thriving little hamlet it is, Victor!

battle.speaker: Victor
battle.line: Indeed. I think it'll make for a fine bit of pillaging, Vincent.

battle.speaker: Victor
battle.line: Well then, I believe it's my turn to do the honors, isn't it, Vincent?

battle.speaker: Vincent
battle.line: I do believe it is, Victor! Oh, but try not to kill them all this time, hmm? It tends to cut into profits.

battle.speaker: Anna
battle.line: Hate to be the bearer of bad news, but I'm afraid this village is closed.

battle.speaker: Victor
battle.line: You! We have business, you and I, and I aim to settle the debt. Vincent will be avenged today!

battle.speaker: Victor
battle.line: Playing dumb won't save you, girly. The gold you net from the slavers will build Vincent the finest grave in the land!

battle.speaker: Anna
battle.line: Careful, love. Us traders are known to make some very deep cuts.

battle.speaker: Frederick
battle.line: That village is in danger. One must ride ahead and warn them of what's coming.

battle-talk.speaker: Anna
battle-talk.line: My thanks, stranger. It's nice to see a friendly face for once.

battle-talk.speaker: Chrom
battle-talk.line: "Stranger?" Now I'm confused. Aren't you...? I mean... Anyway, never mind. The important thing is that you're safe. You seem to have things well in hand, but I hope you won't mind a little company? Just until we sort these rogues out.

battle-talk.speaker: Anna
battle-talk.line: Aw, you're worried! That's adorable! I welcome the assistance.

character-falls.speaker: Anna
character-falls.line: Ugh. Well, that was careless... Sorry, friends. Looks like I've got to close up shop for today.

visit.speaker: Elder
visit.line: That peddler woman was fighting to protect the village, you say? That kind of warmth is more than welcome in these cold lands. Here. Please use this to heal her if she's hurt.

boss.speaker: Victor
boss.line: Give up now! I was born a Victor, and victory will be mine!

boss.speaker: Victor
boss.line: I... I see an open field, Vincent... Such beautiful flowers...

end.speaker: Anna
end.line: Ah, I see now. You must have met one of my sisters.

end.speaker: Anna
end.line: Yes, there's a strong family resemblance. Oh, and we're all traveling merchants.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Your holiday feasts must be very confusing. How do you tell each other apart?

end.speaker: Anna
end.line: Heh, that's part of the secret! Anyway, happy shopping, and may the gods of the open road keep you!
